column1: Table 3.   Percent distribution of expenditure for the justice system by type of government, fiscal year 2008
Series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts 2008 - Final, NCJ 237912
Data source:  Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (CJEE)
Table 3.   Percent distribution of expenditure for the justice system by type of government, fiscal year 2008
Note:  Local government data are estimates subject to variability.
Population figures are from the Bureau of the Census, Current Population Reports, Series P-25, No. 1045, July 2009.

a/ Total direct expenditures include outlays of states and all types of local governments including independent school districts and special districts , which are not displayed separately.   The "Local, total" lines, which include these districts, will not equal the sum of the "Counties" and "Municipalities" lines.
b/ Justice system expenditure of independent school districts (primarily for special police forces) are not available.
